channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- FlashSystem 900
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- FlashSystem 900

item.title: CVE-2018-1822|2024-09-16T19:41:18.238Z -- ibm -- flashsystem%20900
item.description: IBM FlashSystem 900 product GUI allows a specially crafted attack to bypass the authentication requirements of the system, resulting in the ability to remotely change the superuser password. This can be used by an attacker to gain administrative control or to deny service. IBM X-Force ID: 150296.

item.title: CVE-2021-29873|2024-09-16T20:17:23.473Z -- ibm -- flashsystem%20900
item.description: IBM Flash System 900 could allow an authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information and cause a denial of service due to a restricted shell escape vulnerability. IBM X-Force ID: 206229.
